events.title: Software Engineer Intern
events.content: Currently working as a Software Engineer Intern at Anakin (YC21), responsible for developing a generic scraper for HTML-based content. Working primarily with Python and processing data through AWS, Pandas, and S3. Also built efficient libraries with documentation for team members to use.

events.title: Software Development Intern
events.content: Worked as a Software Development Intern at The One World, helping design and develop a containerized fast API backend to support a large-scale social media platform. Utilized tools such as Docker, AWS, and PostgreSQL as the database.

events.title: Artificial Intelligence Intern
events.content: Worked as an Artificial Intelligence Intern at The One World, designing and building various types of models, including recommendation engines and rooftop age detection. Developed a Dashboard using Dash Plotly and deployed them using AWS EC2. Utilized technologies such as AWS, Yolo, Sklearn, CNN, and Dash.

events.title: Machine Learning Intern
events.content: Worked as a Machine Learning Intern at UFF Foods, responsible for ETL (Extract, Transform, and Load) for NLP. Developed a Selenium scraper for Zomato.
